oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bookmobile - 1969
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bookmobiles; libraries; transportation; 1960s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A clipping from the "Memphis Memories" section of the Commercial Appeal. Caption reads, "The Shelby County Libraries Bookmobile was a 34-foot-long air-conditioned bus with an average monthly circulation of about 4,000 books when this picture was taken in June 1969."
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Photo courtesy of Special Collections/University of Memphis Libraries
